pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Toolkit for Mass Spectrometry // Quickly imports, processes, analyzes, and visualizes mass-spectrometric data. Includes functions for easily extracting specific data and measurements from large (multi-gigabyte) raw Bruker data files, as well as a set of S3 object classes for manipulating and measuring mass spectrometric peaks and plotting peaks and spectra using the 'ggplot2' package.
